title: Population genetic structure and ecological differentiation in the bryozoan genus Reteporella across the Azores Archipelago (central North Atlantic)
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Lara Baptista, Manuel Curto, Andrea Waeschenbach, Björn Berning, António M. Santos, Sérgio P. Ávila, Harald Meimberg
